name: The Light (itch) (BAVC Next-Gen)
description:
Whoosh whoosh. Mysteriously, you have been warped through time, there is no clear way out. 

You say to yourself, “This place looks familiar… futuristic even.” It seems you have gone into the future. Find a way out!!

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Space Bar to jump
X key for dialogue

Created by Eden Huang, 2021

This semester in Game Code Design students worked on portraying themes of mental wellbeing and exploration by developing a simple 2D side scroller game set in San Francisco. As their player will move through the city, they’ll stop to engage in playful dialogue with other characters.
